project.title: Weather Application
project.description: Developed a responsive web-based application that provides current weather information for a given geographic location.

project.title: Cabin Reservation System
project.description: Cabin Reservation System is a software designed to be used by a customer to find and reserve a cabin. The design patterns implemented are – Mediator Pattern, Decorator Pattern, and Bridge Pattern.

project.title: Yoga Studio Web Application
project.description: Yoga Studio is a web application built to create, manage, and enroll in yoga courses offered by the studio.

project.title: Web Portfolio
project.description: Created a website that includes a portfolio about self – archanab.me.
